Evasion
/ Mortuary Mark
6 Range / 2AP

Makes the targeted ally Unlockable.

For 1 turn, if that ally suffers close-combat damage:
• The ally is pushed by their attacker.
• Increases their MP.
• Makes them invisible.

The targeted ally cannot trigger the spell's effects themself.

Lethal Attack
/ Larceny
1 - 2 Range / 4AP

Inflicts Earth damage.
The damage is greater on targets with less than 25% of their health points.
Required level: :
160

43 to 48 (Earth damage)
54 to 60 (Earth damage)

65 to 72 (Earth damage)

20%

3

2

No

Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Toxic Injection
/ Furrow
1 - 5 Range / 5AP

Applies a start-of-turn Air poison on the target.
The spell's cooldown period is reduced for each of the caster's triggered traps.
Required level: :
165

Normal effects

28 to 32 (Air damage)
Toxic Injection: -1 turns until recast

Critical effects

34 to 38 (Air damage)
Toxic Injection: -1 turns until recast

Other characteristics

Probability of Critical Hit
25%
Recast interval
5
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Toxic Injection
details.description:
Applies a start-of-turn Air poison on the target. 
The spell's cooldown period is reduced for each of the caster's triggered traps.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Insidious Trap
/ Drift Trap
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Places a trap that applies a start-of-turn Air poison on enemies, inflicts Air damage on them, and attracts entities towards the centre in an area of effect.
Required level: :
175

Normal effects

Places a trap

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No
Area of Effect
1-cell diagonal cross

details.name: Insidious Trap

spells.html_content:
Spells

Fragmentation Trap
/ Sickrat Trap
1 - 6 Range / 4AP

Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Fire damage in a 3-cell circle.
The damage is greater depending on the distance from the trap.
Does not affect the ally that triggers the trap.
Required level: :
180

Normal effects

Places a trap

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

spells.html_content:
Spells

Mortuary Mark
/ Evasion
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Erodes the target.
The erosion is greater based on the number of the caster's triggered traps.
